Help:Node.title: lock
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: $(keyword) [object]
EXAMPLE: $(keyword) west door; or $(keyword) box
Some doors and some containers have locks. If the object is closed, you may lock it with the "lock" command; if the object is closed and locked, you may unlock it with the "unlock" command.
In order to lock and unlock objects, you must have the appropriate key. The lock and unlock commands will automatically search through your inventory for the right key. Some keys may be skeleton keys, which can lock and unlock multiple objects.
SEE ALSO: ,
